title: Rav Shaul's Grandson Hanachas Tefillin
body: Rav Shaul Alter, Gerer Rosh Yeshiva, celebrated his grandson's hanachas tefillin with a tish lechaim. The milestone was marked in the Gerer court following Shacharis.

title: Satmar Faction Backs Mamdani
body: Satmar community faction endorses Zohran Mamdani, a mayoral candidate seen as controversial due to his support for jihad and Muslim socialism, sparking internal rifts.

title: Rav Landau Returns to Israel
body: Rav Dov Landau, 95, returns to Israel after falling ill in Switzerland. Despite doctor's orders, he delivers a shiur upon arrival at Yeshivas Slabodka.

title: Miami Beach Mayor Wins Re-Election
body: Orthodox Jewish Mayor Steven Meiner narrowly secured a second term in Miami Beach, edging out Commissioner Kristen Rosen Gonzalez 51%-49%. Meiner cited his achievements since taking office in 2023.
